item.title: [PI] Magic VS player
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

public void pvpMageDamage(int damage) { Client o = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[c.playerIndex]; if (Misc.random(o.getCombat().calculateMeleeDefence()) > 10+ Misc.random(mageAtk())) { damage/=2; }

Anyone see something wrong with that?
had to remove getBonusattack from the method because it was throwing an error.

Help = Rep++.

Edit: A slight description of my problem = Attacking a player with magic doesn’t even hit. as in not even a “0” mark.

Read full topic
